product_name: Picnic At Ascot Equipped Picnic Cooler for 2
long_description: When it's just you and your sweetie, bring along the insulated Equipped Picnic Cooler for 2 from Picnic At Ascot. It keeps food and drinks chilled and contains full place settings for 2. Made of durable polyester canvas with a hand grip and adjustable shoulder strap. Insulated main compartment has separate sections for food and drinks; a handy lid opening lets you retrieve a single bottle. Cooler is leak-proof, so may be used with ice to extend cooling time. Inside the fold-down front section are 2 each of acrylic wine glasses, melamine plates, stainless-steel 3-piece flatware sets (knife, fork and spoon) and cloth napkins. You'll also find a cheese knife and wooden-handled stainless-steel corkscrew/bottle opener/knife. Outside pocket on the Equipped Picnic Cooler for 2 from Picnic At Ascot stores small extras.
short_description: When it's just you and your sweetie, bring along the insulated Equipped Picnic Cooler for 2 from Picnic At Ascot. It keeps food and drinks chilled and contains full place settings for 2.
